name: Binary Star
description:
As the captain of mankind's last colony ship, you must constantly balance conflicting priorities while guiding your crew to their new home. Your choices in tough situation will effect the crew's survival as well as the new colony's values.

Gameplay: 2-5 minutes per playthrough, though the game is built for players to explore multiple playthroughs with different end results.

Controls: Tap or Click the desired choice.

This was a Global Game Jam 2022 entry.
